law.catch_line: Trust Fund; Administration Upon Cessation Of Unemployment Compensation Fund Or Federal Separate Book Account; Investments

text.section: Bonds or other interest-bearing obligations of the United States of America;
Other direct obligations of the United States;
Securities which are the direct obligations of the commonwealth;

Bonds and other interest-bearing obligations of any legally constituted political subdivision of the commonwealth, if such subdivision has never defaulted in the payment of the principal or interest of any of its bonds or other interest-bearing obligations.
